keys: C1: Entornos físicos. Hoja de trabajo

          <title>
            <string language="en">Volcanoes and Earthquakes</string>
            <string language="es">Volcanes y terremotos</string>
            <string language="ga">Bolcáin agus Creathanna Talún</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vulkane und Erdbeben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Volcans et tremblements de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vulcões e terremotos</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηφαίστεια και σεισμοί</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet with 15 questions on the topics of earthquakes and volcanoes. Excellent revision exercise.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo con 15 preguntas sobre los temas de los terremotos y los volcanes. Excelente ayuda para revisión.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre le 15 cheist ar thopaicí na gcreathanna talúin agus an mbolcán. Ceacht iontach le haghaidh dul siar.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía</string>
            <string language="ga">Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">C1: Physical Environment</string>

          <keyword>

            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen mit 15 Fragen über die Themen von Erdbeben 
und von Vulkanen. Ausgezeichnete Änderungübung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau avec 15 questions sur les sujets des 
tremblements de terre et des volcans. Excellent exercice de 
révision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha com 15 perguntas nos tópicos dos terremotos
e dos vulcões. Exercício excelente da revisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro con 15 domande sui soggetti dei 
terremoti e dei vulcani. Esercitazione eccellente di revisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας με 15 ερωτήσεις στα θέματα των 
σεισμών και των ηφαιστείων. Αριστη άσκηση αναθεώρησης.</string>
          </description>
